title: Notable & Quotable: The OSHA Vaccine Mandate
sub_head: ‘The Mandate’s strained prescriptions combine to make it the rare government pronouncement that is both overinclusive . . . and underinclusive,’
body: Judge Kurt D. Englehardtwriting for a three-judge panel of the Fifth U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals in a Nov. 12 order staying enforcement of the Occupational Safety and Health Administration’s Covid-19 vaccination mandate:
